title: Pumpkin Spice Keto Fat Bomb Recipe
directions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl and place in the freezer for 30 minutes. Roll into balls and place on a plate. Let the balls sit in the refrigerator for 1 hours before eating. Keeps for a week or longer in the freezer.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon cinnamon (order here) or I used 2 drops cinnamon bark vitality essential oil (order here).
1/4 cup confectioners swerve (order here) or 1/3 teaspoon stevia or to taste (order here)
(note: 1/2 cup coconut sugar can be used for Paleo)
